AddTags.title: AddTags
AddTags.summary: Adds tags to an application group.

ApplyMetricRuleTemplate.title: ApplyMetricRuleTemplate
ApplyMetricRuleTemplate.summary: Applies an alert template to an application group to generate an alert rule.

BatchExport.title: BatchExport
BatchExport.summary: Exports the monitoring data that is defined in the Cursor operation.

CreateDynamicTagGroup.title: CreateDynamicTagGroup
CreateDynamicTagGroup.summary: Creates an application group based on the tags of cloud resources.

CreateGroupMetricRules.title: CreateGroupMetricRules
CreateGroupMetricRules.summary: Creates one or more alert rules for a specified application group.

CreateGroupMonitoringAgentProcess.title: CreateGroupMonitoringAgentProcess
CreateGroupMonitoringAgentProcess.summary: Creates a process monitoring task for an application group.

CreateHybridMonitorSLSGroup.title: CreateHybridMonitorSLSGroup
CreateHybridMonitorSLSGroup.summary: Creates a Logstore group of Hybrid Cloud Monitoring.

CreateHybridMonitorTask.title: CreateHybridMonitorTask
CreateHybridMonitorTask.summary: Creates a metric import task for an Alibaba Cloud service or creates a metric for logs imported from Simple Log Service.

CreateMetricRuleResources.title: CreateMetricRuleResources
CreateMetricRuleResources.summary: Associates resources with an alert rule.

CreateMonitorAgentProcess.title: CreateMonitorAgentProcess
CreateMonitorAgentProcess.summary: Creates a task to monitor a process.

CreateMonitorGroupByResourceGroupId.title: CreateMonitorGroupByResourceGroupId
CreateMonitorGroupByResourceGroupId.summary: Creates an application group by using a resource group.

CreateMonitorGroupInstances.title: CreateMonitorGroupInstances
CreateMonitorGroupInstances.summary: Adds resources to an application group.

CreateMonitorGroupNotifyPolicy.title: CreateMonitorGroupNotifyPolicy
CreateMonitorGroupNotifyPolicy.summary: Creates a policy to pause alert notifications for an application group.

CreateMonitoringAgentProcess.title: CreateMonitoringAgentProcess
CreateMonitoringAgentProcess.summary: Creates a task to monitor a process.

Cursor.title: Cursor
Cursor.summary: Defines the range of monitoring data that you want to export. The Cursor information is returned. When you call the BatchExport operation for the first time, you must specify the Cursor information.

DeleteCustomMetric.title: DeleteCustomMetric
DeleteCustomMetric.summary: Deletes the reported monitoring data of a metric.

DeleteEventRuleTargets.title: DeleteEventRuleTargets
DeleteEventRuleTargets.summary: Deletes the push channels of an event-triggered alert rule.

DeleteExporterOutput.title: DeleteExporterOutput
DeleteExporterOutput.summary: Deletes a configuration set that is used to export monitoring data.

DeleteGroupMonitoringAgentProcess.title: DeleteGroupMonitoringAgentProcess
DeleteGroupMonitoringAgentProcess.summary: Deletes a process monitoring task for an application group.

DeleteHybridMonitorTask.title: DeleteHybridMonitorTask
DeleteHybridMonitorTask.summary: Deletes a metric import task for Alibaba Cloud services or a metric for the logs that are imported from Log Service.

DeleteMetricRuleBlackList.title: DeleteMetricRuleBlackList
DeleteMetricRuleBlackList.summary: Deletes multiple blacklist policies at a time.

DeleteMetricRuleResources.title: DeleteMetricRuleResources
DeleteMetricRuleResources.summary: Disassociates resources from an alert rule.

DeleteMetricRuleTargets.title: DeleteMetricRuleTargets
DeleteMetricRuleTargets.summary: Delete the push channels of an alert rule.

DeleteMetricRules.title: DeleteMetricRules
DeleteMetricRules.summary: Deletes one or more alert rules.

DeleteMonitorGroupDynamicRule.title: DeleteMonitorGroupDynamicRule
DeleteMonitorGroupDynamicRule.summary: Deletes a rule that is used to dynamically add the instances of a service to an application group.

DeleteMonitorGroupInstances.title: DeleteMonitorGroupInstances
DeleteMonitorGroupInstances.summary: Removes instances from an application group.

DeleteMonitorGroupNotifyPolicy.title: DeleteMonitorGroupNotifyPolicy
DeleteMonitorGroupNotifyPolicy.summary: Deletes a policy that is used to pause alert notifications for an application group.

DeleteSiteMonitors.title: DeleteSiteMonitors
DeleteSiteMonitors.summary: Deletes one or more site monitoring tasks.

DescribeActiveMetricRuleList.title: DescribeActiveMetricRuleList
DescribeActiveMetricRuleList.summary: Queries the details of initiative alert rules.

DescribeAlertLogCount.title: DescribeAlertLogCount
DescribeAlertLogCount.summary: Queries the statistics of alert logs.

DescribeAlertLogHistogram.title: DescribeAlertLogHistogram
DescribeAlertLogHistogram.summary: Queries the number of alert logs that are generated during each interval within a period of time.

DescribeAlertingMetricRuleResources.title: DescribeAlertingMetricRuleResources
DescribeAlertingMetricRuleResources.summary: Queries the resources for which active alerts are triggered based on an alert rule.

DescribeContactGroupList.title: Query Alarm Contact Group List
DescribeContactGroupList.summary: Call the DescribeContactGroupList interface to query the list of alarm contact groups.

DescribeContactListByContactGroup.title: DescribeContactListByContactGroup
DescribeContactListByContactGroup.summary: Queries the alert contacts in an alert contact group.

DescribeCustomEventAttribute.title: DescribeCustomEventAttribute
DescribeCustomEventAttribute.summary: Queries the details of a custom event.

DescribeCustomEventCount.title: DescribeCustomEventCount
DescribeCustomEventCount.summary: Queries the number of times that a custom event occurred within a period of time.

DescribeCustomEventHistogram.title: DescribeCustomEventHistogram
DescribeCustomEventHistogram.summary: Queries the number of times that a custom event occurred during each interval within a period of time.

DescribeEventRuleAttribute.title: DescribeEventRuleAttribute
DescribeEventRuleAttribute.summary: Queries the details of an event-triggered alert rule.

DescribeExporterOutputList.title: DescribeExporterOutputList
DescribeExporterOutputList.summary: Queries configuration sets that are used to export monitoring data.

DescribeGroupMonitoringAgentProcess.title: DescribeGroupMonitoringAgentProcess
DescribeGroupMonitoringAgentProcess.summary: Queries the process monitoring tasks for an application group.

DescribeHybridMonitorDataList.title: DescribeHybridMonitorDataList
DescribeHybridMonitorDataList.summary: Queries the monitoring data in a namespace.

DescribeHybridMonitorNamespaceList.title: DescribeHybridMonitorNamespaceList
DescribeHybridMonitorNamespaceList.summary: Queries namespaces and the details of the related metric import tasks.

DescribeLogMonitorAttribute.title: DescribeLogMonitorAttribute
DescribeLogMonitorAttribute.summary: Queries the details of a log monitoring metric.

DescribeMetricData.title: DescribeMetricData
DescribeMetricData.summary: Queries the monitoring data of a metric for a cloud service.

DescribeMetricLast.title: DescribeMetricLast
DescribeMetricLast.summary: Queries the latest monitoring data of a metric.

DescribeMetricList.title: DescribeMetricList
DescribeMetricList.summary: Queries the monitoring data of a metric for a specified cloud service.

DescribeMetricMetaList.title: DescribeMetricMetaList
DescribeMetricMetaList.summary: Queries the details of metrics that are supported in CloudMonitor.

DescribeMetricRuleCount.title: DescribeMetricRuleCount
DescribeMetricRuleCount.summary: Queries the number of alert rules in each state.

DescribeMetricRuleTargets.title: DescribeMetricRuleTargets
DescribeMetricRuleTargets.summary: Queries the resources that are associated with a specified alert rule.

DescribeMetricRuleTemplateAttribute.title: DescribeMetricRuleTemplateAttribute
DescribeMetricRuleTemplateAttribute.summary: Queries the details of an alert template.

DescribeMetricTop.title: DescribeMetricTop
DescribeMetricTop.summary: Queries the latest monitoring data of a metric for a cloud service. The data can be sorted by a specified order.

DescribeMonitorGroupCategories.title: DescribeMonitorGroupCategories
DescribeMonitorGroupCategories.summary: Queries the cloud services to which the resources in an application group belong and the number of resources that belong to each cloud service in the application group.

DescribeMonitorGroupDynamicRules.title: DescribeMonitorGroupDynamicRules
DescribeMonitorGroupDynamicRules.summary: Queries the dynamic rules of an application group.

DescribeMonitorGroupInstanceAttribute.title: DescribeMonitorGroupInstanceAttribute
DescribeMonitorGroupInstanceAttribute.summary: Queries the details of the resources in an application group.

DescribeMonitorGroupInstances.title: DescribeMonitorGroupInstances
DescribeMonitorGroupInstances.summary: Queries the resources in an application group.

DescribeMonitorGroupNotifyPolicyList.title: DescribeMonitorGroupNotifyPolicyList
DescribeMonitorGroupNotifyPolicyList.summary: Queries the policies that are used to pause alert notifications for an application group.

DescribeMonitorResourceQuotaAttribute.title: DescribeMonitorResourceQuotaAttribute
DescribeMonitorResourceQuotaAttribute.summary: Queries the resource quotas of CloudMonitor.

DescribeMonitoringAgentAccessKey.title: DescribeMonitoringAgentAccessKey
DescribeMonitoringAgentAccessKey.summary: Queries the AccessKey ID and AccessKey secret that are required to install the CloudMonitor agent on a third-party host.

DescribeMonitoringAgentConfig.title: DescribeMonitoringAgentConfig
DescribeMonitoringAgentConfig.summary: Queries the configurations of the CloudMonitor agent.

DescribeMonitoringAgentHosts.title: DescribeMonitoringAgentHosts
DescribeMonitoringAgentHosts.summary: Queries all hosts within the current Alibaba Cloud account, including hosts on which the CloudMonitor agent is installed and uninstalled.

DescribeMonitoringAgentStatuses.title: DescribeMonitoringAgentStatuses
DescribeMonitoringAgentStatuses.summary: Queries the status of the CloudMonitor agent.

DescribeMonitoringConfig.title: DescribeMonitoringConfig
DescribeMonitoringConfig.summary: Queries the global configurations of the CloudMonitor agent.

DescribeProductResourceTagKeyList.title: DescribeProductResourceTagKeyList
DescribeProductResourceTagKeyList.summary: Queries the keys of all tags that are attached to cloud resources in a region.

DescribeProductsOfActiveMetricRule.title: DescribeProductsOfActiveMetricRule
DescribeProductsOfActiveMetricRule.summary: Queries the cloud services for which the initiative alert feature is enabled.

DescribeProjectMeta.title: DescribeProjectMeta
DescribeProjectMeta.summary: Queries the information about monitored services in CloudMonitor.

DescribeSiteMonitorAttribute.title: DescribeSiteMonitorAttribute
DescribeSiteMonitorAttribute.summary: Queries the details of a site monitoring task.

DescribeSiteMonitorData.title: DescribeSiteMonitorData
DescribeSiteMonitorData.summary: Queries the fine-grained monitoring data of a site monitoring task.

DescribeSiteMonitorISPCityList.title: DescribeSiteMonitorISPCityList
DescribeSiteMonitorISPCityList.summary: Queries the detection points that are provided by carriers.

DescribeSiteMonitorLog.title: DescribeSiteMonitorLog
DescribeSiteMonitorLog.summary: Queries the logs of one or more instant test tasks.

DescribeSiteMonitorQuota.title: DescribeSiteMonitorQuota
DescribeSiteMonitorQuota.summary: Queries the quotas and version of site monitoring.

DescribeSiteMonitorStatistics.title: DescribeSiteMonitorStatistics
DescribeSiteMonitorStatistics.summary: Queries the statistics of a specified metric for a specified site monitoring task.

DescribeSystemEventAttribute.title: DescribeSystemEventAttribute
DescribeSystemEventAttribute.summary: Queries the details of a system event.

DescribeSystemEventCount.title: DescribeSystemEventCount
DescribeSystemEventCount.summary: Queries the number of times that a system event of a cloud service has occurred.

DescribeSystemEventHistogram.title: DescribeSystemEventHistogram
DescribeSystemEventHistogram.summary: Queries the number of times a system event occurred during each interval within a period of time.

DescribeSystemEventMetaList.title: DescribeSystemEventMetaList
DescribeSystemEventMetaList.summary: Queries the meta information about system events.

DescribeTagValueList.title: DescribeTagValueList
DescribeTagValueList.summary: Queries the tag values corresponding to a specified tag key.

DescribeUnhealthyHostAvailability.title: DescribeUnhealthyHostAvailability
DescribeUnhealthyHostAvailability.summary: Queries unhealthy instances detected by availability monitoring tasks.

DisableActiveMetricRule.title: DisableActiveMetricRule
DisableActiveMetricRule.summary: Disables the initiative alert feature for a cloud service.

EnableActiveMetricRule.title: EnableActiveMetricRule
EnableActiveMetricRule.summary: Enables the initiative alert feature for a cloud service.

EnableMetricRuleBlackList.title: EnableMetricRuleBlackList
EnableMetricRuleBlackList.summary: Enables or disables multiple blacklist policies at a time.

ModifyHybridMonitorTask.title: ModifyHybridMonitorTask
ModifyHybridMonitorTask.summary: Modifies a metric for the logs that are imported from Log Service.

PutContact.title: PutContact
PutContact.summary: Creates or modifies an alert contact.

PutContactGroup.title: PutContactGroup
PutContactGroup.summary: Creates or modifies an alert contact group.

PutEventRuleTargets.title: PutEventRuleTargets
PutEventRuleTargets.summary: Adds or modifies the push channels of an event-triggered alert rule.

PutExporterOutput.title: PutExporterOutput
PutExporterOutput.summary: Creates or modifies a configuration set for exporting monitoring data.

PutExporterRule.title: PutExporterRule
PutExporterRule.summary: Creates or modifies a data export rule.

PutGroupMetricRule.title: PutGroupMetricRule
PutGroupMetricRule.summary: Creates or modifies an alert rule for an application group.

PutHybridMonitorMetricData.title: PutHybridMonitorMetricData
PutHybridMonitorMetricData.summary: Imports the monitoring data of a metric to a namespace of Hybrid Cloud Monitoring.

PutLogMonitor.title: PutLogMonitor
PutLogMonitor.summary: Creates or modifies a log monitoring metric.

PutMetricRuleTargets.title: PutMetricRuleTargets
PutMetricRuleTargets.summary: Adds or modifies the push channels of an alert rule.

PutMonitorGroupDynamicRule.title: PutMonitorGroupDynamicRule
PutMonitorGroupDynamicRule.summary: Creates or modifies an alert rule to dynamically add instances that meet the rule to an application group.

PutMonitoringConfig.title: PutMonitoringConfig
PutMonitoringConfig.summary: Configures global settings for the CloudMonitor agent.

PutResourceMetricRules.title: PutResourceMetricRules
PutResourceMetricRules.summary: Creates multiple alert rules for the specified metric of a specified resource.

SendDryRunSystemEvent.title: SendDryRunSystemEvent
SendDryRunSystemEvent.summary: Debugs a system event of an Alibaba Cloud service.

UninstallMonitoringAgent.title: UninstallMonitoringAgent
UninstallMonitoringAgent.summary: Uninstalls the CloudMonitor agent from a third-party host.
